message:
The Lebanese Ministry of Health:
4 killed in the IDF attack in the village of Mayfadoun 👆 in southern Lebanon.
event_breakdown: The Lebanese Ministry of Health has announced that four people have been killed in an IDF attack in the village of Mayfadoun in southern Lebanon. The attack targeted a Hezbollah outpost. The IDF attack comes in response to the launch of a rocket from Lebanon into Israel earlier on Wednesday. No injuries were reported in Israel.

message:
Today at 17:00 Nasrallah will deliver a speech marking the one week anniversary of the assassination of Hezbollah Chief of Staff Fuad Shukr.

His supporters expect that hints will be given regarding the timing of the response.

It can be assumed that Hezbollah's response to the assassination of Shukr will be separate from the Iranian one to the death of Haniyeh - to "respect" each of the assassinated separately, but it can be also assumed that there is significant cooperation and coordination on the matter between Iran and Hezbollah.
event_breakdown:
Hezbollah Response
Nasrallah, Hezbollah leader, will deliver a speech marking the one week anniversary of the assassination of Fuad Shukr, Hezbollah Chief of Staff.

message:
PA chairman Abu Mazen, in an interview with Russian media ahead of an expected visit to Moscow on August 12-14:

I condemn the killing of Ismail Haniyeh.

The purpose of the assassination was to delay the arrival of a cease-fire agreement in Gaza.

The government in Gaza should be under the umbrella of the PLO and under the Palestinian government.
event_breakdown: Ismail Haniyeh was assassinated.

message:
In Jenin, the IDF's anti-terrorism activity continues since yesterday afternoon.
IDF bulldozers are clearing the roads in Jenin of burried IEDs. Explosives are occasionally fired at the bulldozers.

message:
The Palestinians report 4 dead and 7 wounded in the IDF's activity tonight in Tubas in northeastern Samaria.

All four (including a 14-year-old boy) are referred to as "A-Shaheed Al-Majahad" ("The Fighting Martyr") in posters distributed on social networks. A title reserved by the Palestinians for military operatives.
At least one of the dead (Amid Aghnam of the Islamic Jihad) was inside a building surrounded by IDF forces in Tubas tonight.
location: Based on the text, the most specific location appears to be 'Tubas'.

message: The Palestinians are documenting the destruction left behind by IDF forces in eastern Jenin.

The Israeli Military has been conducting raids in Jenin and other West Bank cities on a regular basis, with the stated purpose of arresting suspected militants and confiscating weapons.

message:
Abu Khader of Deir al-Balah is also "disturbed" that the Iranian response is delayed:

"Khomeini stated that Netanyahu would not be able to sleep even one night (because of the response) and so wouldn't Israel...
And here... he (Netanyahu) is sleeping until now...
Wake him up... wake him up... he's still sleeping now"
location: The Israeli prime minister is sleeping now.

The area is near the "Shaheed and Tanfur" air base in the south of Isfahan province.

Yahya Sinwar was unanimously elected by the members of Hamas's Political Bureau. He is authorized to appoint his own deputy independently, provided that the deputy is a member of Hamas's Shura Council.

Hamas, in an official announcement: Yahya Sinwar replaces Ismail Haniyeh as the leader of Hamas.

##
This means that Israel can now target the movement's leader without the additional complications of involving foreign countries.

message:
Nasrallah concludes:

Our reaction is on the way - may be separately or may be together with the entire axis of resistance.

We did not escalate the campaign for ten months. But an attack in Dahieh is not the same. Israel is the one that escalated. It is not possible for us to be required to treat an attack in Dahieh like a normal attack.
The response is on the way. We will wait for the field.
event_breakdown: Israel launches air strikes on Iranian targets in Syria

message:
Nasrallah:

Our goal is to stop the aggression on Gaza.
The Americans who say they will stop the war cannot be trusted.
event_breakdown:
Nasrallah: Our goal is to stop the aggression on Gaza
Nasrallah, leader of the Lebanese Hezbollah group, said in his speech that the goal was to stop the Israeli aggression on Gaza. He said that the Americans could not be trusted to stop the war and added that an international force was needed. This is an undoubted security event.

message:
Nasrallah:

If Netanyahu wanted a war with Lebanon, he would have already started it.

An Iron Dome missile landed today on the main road near Nahariya and injured 19.

The mayor of Nahariya initially said that Hezbollah attacked Nahariya... and the IDF spokesman announced that it was an Iron Dome missile.

And what happened in Majdal Shams?
The IDF spokesman did not tell them the truth as he told the mayor of Nahariya.
event_breakdown:
IDF spokesman told the mayor of Majdal Shams that the Iron Dome missile was fired towards Lebanon
IDF spokesman told the mayor of Nahariya that the Iron Dome missile that landed on the main road near Nahariya was fired towards Lebanon
IDF spokesman did not tell the truth to the mayor of Majdal Shams

message:
Nasrallah:

Hezbollah will respond to the elimination of Fuad.
Iran will respond to the elimination of Haniyeh.
The enemy now has to wait.
The Israeli expectation (for a response) "on a foot and a quarter" (not a foot and a half as the expression usually goes -AA) for a week is part of the reaction and part of the punishment. It's part of the war. Psychological warfare is part of the campaign.

This time, all of Israel from north to south is waiting for a response. Standing on a foot and a quarter.

Nasrallah lists types of targets that could be targets for Hezbollah: 
There are high-value economic enterprises in Israel - which can be destroyed in half an hour.
event_breakdown: High-value economic enterprises in Israel.

message:
Nasrallah:

Calls on the Lebanese who don't want to join the war to at least not stab the resistance in Lebanon in the back (in this context he notes the fabricated evacuation warnings by the Lebanese against the residents of Dahieh and the joy of some of the Arab media when Hezbollah operatives and commanders are killed).

You must fear the victory of Israel and not the victory of the resistance in Lebanon.
event_breakdown:
Events reported in text:
- Israeli attacks in Syria
- Israeli attacks in Iraq
- Saudi-led coalition in Yemen
- US forces withdrawing from northeast Syria

message:
Nasrallah:

We call on the fighting areas that support Gaza to continue their operations despite the losses.

We do not require Syria to join the campaign due to the special security situation in Syria.

We also did not ask Iran to join (beyond their reactions to the assassinations).
event_breakdown:
Nasrallah:
Nasrallah, the secretary general of Hezbollah, called on fighting areas that support Gaza to continue their operations despite the losses. He also stated that Hezbollah did not require Syria to join the campaign due to the special security situation in Syria. Finally, he noted that Iran was not asked to join the campaign.

message:
Nasrallah:

The purpose of this war is to prevent Israel from eliminating the Palestinian resistance and the Palestinian issue.
The goal is not to eliminate Israel at this stage. But only to prevent the elimination of the Palestinian resistance. It is the duty of every person.
event_breakdown:
Israel-Gaza Conflict (2021)
A 11-day conflict erupted between Palestinian militants in Gaza and the Israeli military. The crisis was triggered by days of violence and clashes in contested Jerusalem. The Israeli government ordered the military operation and airstrikes on Gaza in response to rocket fire.

Southern Israel - Gaza Border
Senseless Israeli counterattack on Syria after missile attack blamed on Iran. Israel's claim of a missile attack from Iranian soil was countered by denials from Tehran. Israel has carried out more than 150 airstrikes in retaliation.
Nasrallah is the leader of the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah, and he made the comment in the context of the ongoing Israel-Gaza conflict. He emphasized that Hezbollah's goal is not to eliminate Israel at this point, but rather to prevent the elimination of the Palestinian resistance. Nasrallah's statement underscores the current political climate and the ongoing tensions in the region.

message:
Nasrallah:

Despite all of Israel's preparations and high alert in the north today - Hezbollah's UAVs managed to reach Acre.

If we assume the resistance will lose in Gaza or Lebanon - al-Aqsa Mosque and all the holy places will be in danger. Palestine will be in danger. Jordan will be in danger. Syria will be in danger. Egypt will also be in danger and all the countries of the region. Israel will endanger everyone.
event_breakdown:
Nasrallah: Despite all of Israel's preparations and high alert in the north today - Hezbollah's UAVs managed to reach Acre.
- Hezbollah's UAVs (Unmanned Aerial Vehicles) managed to reach Acre, a city in Northern Israel. The event took place on June 17, 2022, as reported by Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah. The target of the event was likely Israeli assets and infrastructure.

message:
Nasrallah's speech is underway.
He refers to the Air Force's activity now in the skies of Beirut (breaking the sound barrier) - "The enemy is celebrating because of the event (a week for the elimination of Fuad Shukr)".
event_breakdown: Nasrallah's speech refers to the Air Force's activity in the skies of Beirut.

message:
IDF Spokesperson: Following the sirens that sounded over the past hour in northern Israel, a number of hostile UAVs were identified crossing from Lebanon. One of the UAVs was intercepted. Several civilians were injured to the south of Nahariya during the incident.

Rocket and missile sirens were sounded following the possibility of falling shrapnel from the interception. 

Following the siren that sounded at 12:56 in the area of Acre, it was determined to be a false identification.

message: South Lebanon: Lebanese channels report casualties in an IDF attack in the village of Mayfadoun in the Nabatieh region.
event_breakdown:
IDF attack targets Hezbollah base near Beirut
Lebanese media reported on Saturday night that an Israeli Air Force site had bombed a Hezbollah base near Beirut. The IDF said the base was being used by the military of Iran to manufacture weapons. Hassan Nasrallah, head of Hezbollah, said on Wednesday that the next confrontation with Israel was “not far away.”
Kuwaiti security personnel were arrested after an Instagram video was posted.
Kuwaiti police have detained at least three off-duty security personnel after a video clip was posted on YouTube showing them firing electronic cigarettes into the air.
Bahrain King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa pardoned 250 prisoners.
Bahrain King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa has issued a royal decree dismissing 250 inmates in the country. Most of those released were convicted or accused of terrorism. The official Bahrain News Agency said the move was meant to contribute to “stabilize security in the country” and promote the approach of intentional forgiveness.
Lebanon – Arrests in connection with Salim Ayyash
Prosecutors in Lebanon have remanded three suspects in the reported murder of a man and leading member of Hezbollah Salim Ayyash as part of an investigation into a disqualification that al-Hadath (Free Patriotic Movement), announced on Monday when they were arrested.
Four wanted criminals were arrested by the terrorist group in an operation headed by Investigator General Samir Chehab, according to news reports.
Three suspects, 16-year-old Sydney and 21-year-old Danny Ayyash, were detained in the same incident as Sydney, while a 20-year-old woman was arrested for assisting Sydney.

message:
Another death in the drone attack in East Jenin:
Ayham al Jaber Kafauna.... He must have been knitting sweaters for the elderly in his spare time.
event_breakdown: New reports of a drone attack in East Jenin. The target was a refugee camp that was struck by four missiles. At least three people were killed, including a man named Ayham al Jaber Kafauna, and six others were wounded. The attack is under investigation. No group has claimed responsibility for this attack.

message:

It turns out that he had other hobbies...

As a result of the intense bombing raids in Kabul, dozens, both Afghans and foreigners are said to have fled their homes on Sunday. The Islamic Resistance Front, as well as Israel has killed one of Gazan teenagers, which resulted in demonstration against Israeli forces.

Adham Nasser.

Number 399

message:
Before Nasrallah's speech, Hezbollah announces three more deaths in its ranks (four as of this morning):

Hossein Yassin
Ali Shams A-Din
Amin Bader a-Din (Nickname: Zulfiqar)

Like the first person killed this morning, all three were also killed in an IDF attack in Mayfadoun in southern Lebanon 👆

Amin Badr al-Din he is the nephew of the senior Mustafa Bader al-Din, who served as the head of Hezbollah's foreign affairs apparatus and was killed in 2016 in Syria.
The IDF spokesman hinted in Arabic at the time that this was an internal assassination of Hezbollah. In Lebanon, Mustafa is credited with the assassination of the then prime minister of Lebanon, Rafic al-Hariri, in 2005.

398 dead for Hezbollah since the beginning of the war.
event_breakdown: IDF attack targets Hezbollah personnel in Lebanon. IDF confirms strike. 4 Hezbollah members killed. IDF hints at Hezbollah involvement in assassination of senior Lebanese figure Mustafa Bader al-Din in 2016.
